headline: Schwab Announces Expanded 2025 Lineup of Signature Live Events
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, April 23, 2025--Charles Schwab, a leader in investing and trading with $9.93 trillion in total client assets that facilitated approximately 7.4 million daily average trades in Q1 2025, today announced this year’s lineup of its signature in-person Schwab Coaching Trading Workshop and Market Drive trading education events. headline: World Economic Forum board backs launch of independent probe into founder Klaus Schwab
summary: The World Economic Forum, which runs an annual gathering of elites in Davos, Switzerland, says its board has given its unanimous support for an independent investigation into allegations of misconduct by founder Klaus Schwab.  The statement from the Geneva-based think tank and event organizer late Tuesday came after a report published by The Wall Street Journal cited a whistleblower letter alleging financial and ethical misconduct by Schwab, 87, and his wife, Hilde.
